resources.string:
App created by Kim Jimenez and Matt Lupino 

 This app displays the office information for all CNU professors who filled out our web form. 

 To filter by your favorites, please type "fav", "fave", or "favorite" in the search bar. 

 If you see an item in the list that is highlighted GREEN, then that means they are in their office right now. 

 Happy Schooling!



 Icon courtesy of Bharat Kumara (for the clock and person) and Amy Morgan (for the graduation cap) of The Noun Project.
